name: Eighteenth Dynasty
description: The 18th Dynasty is one of the most famous dynasties of Ancient Egypt, including pharaohs such as Hatshepsut, Akhenaten, Tutankhamun, and Ramesses I.

name: Nineteenth Dynasty
description: The 19th Dynasty is known for pharaohs like Seti I and Ramesses II, and for major building projects.

name: Twentieth Dynasty
description: The 20th Dynasty saw the decline of the New Kingdom and included Ramesses III.

name: Ptolemaic Dynasty
description: The Last Dynasty of Ancient Egypt.
meta2: Last Dynasty, New Kingdom, Dynasty XX
